channel.title: Moving home
channel.description:
hey, on my server im moving home, infact ive already moved home, shops are set up and everything
the thing is i want to get rid of the shops from the old home but idk how to :S also how can i change whats in shops and make new ones? ALSO how do i change the home teleport location on the mage tab, ive already changed ::home
thankyou
p.s. this is a 317

item.title: Moving home
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

For pi, home is located in config class.

rest i believe client class

Read full topic

item.title: Moving home
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“ethanhello, post:3, topic:374983”][quote author=rova1 link=topic=470951.msg3444142#msg3444142 date=1293297292]
what base?

if you were able to add the npc in the new home, why are you not able to remove them from the old home? It’s the exact same file, except instead of writing a new line in autospawn, you just delete the old one.

to alter the items in shops go into shops.cfg, it lists the item id & amount of items in the shop (not the price).

to change the teleport button, search for the old home co-ords in whatever file handles the clicking game frame stuff (eg clickingmost or clickingbuttons.java)
[/quote]

Well i didnt add the npc’s in the first place so idk what files they are in…
thanks on the rest btw :)[/quote]

You can move/spawn NPCs in Autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
